Question: In the novel Splinter of the Mind's Eye (1978), this person and Luke duel, and Luke cuts off this person's right arm.
Hints: Anakin battled Kenobi on the site of a volcano and was badly wounded, but was then reborn as this person.
The treatment is very similar to the final film, except that this person does not reveal he is Luke's father.
On their list of the 100 Greatest Fictional Characters, Fandomania.com ranked this person at number 6.
